text: læa tha hak phwk cea hya phwk nang kxn thi phwk cea ca tæatxng phwk nang doythi phwk cea di ka hn dmahar kæ nang læw k cng hı kæ nang khrung hnung khxng sing thi phwk cea kahnd wi nxkcak wa phwk nang ca yk hı hrux phu thi kar tklng tængngan xyu nı mux khxng khea ca yk hı læa kar thi phwk cea ca yk hı nan pen sing thi kıl kæ khwam yakerng makkwa læa phwk cea xya lum kar thakhun nı rahwang phwk cea thæ cring xallxhˌ pen phuthrng hen nı sing thi phwk cea kratha kan
